item.title: Employer-Sponsored Health Insurance Costs Jumped in 2024, Outpacing Inflation
item.description: Higher premiums and deductibles are making coverage less affordable for employers and workers, a recent analysis found.

item.title: L3Harris Hones Defense Department Focus with Sale of Civil Space Propulsion Unit
item.description: AE Industrial will take a 60 percent stake in the new business focused on civil and commercial space; L3Harris will maintain about a 40 percent share.
